The mbc-cqrs-serverless CLI helps you qu: The mbc-cqrs-serverless CLI helps you quickly scaffold new projects and generate boilerplate code for modules, services, and entities. It follows the framework's conventions to ensure consistency.
Use the CLI when you need to:: Use the CLI when you need to:
Create a new MBC CQRS Serverless project: Create a new MBC CQRS Serverless project from scratch
Add a new domain module (product, order,: Add a new domain module (product, order, user)
Generate controller, service, entity, an: Generate controller, service, entity, and DTO files with correct structure
Setting up project structure manually is: Setting up project structure manually is error-prone
Remembering correct file names and impor: Remembering correct file names and imports
